definition: to do research work/to engage in advanced studies
dried meat/private teacher's remuneration/withered/variant of 修[xiu1]
to decorate/to embellish/to repair/to build/to write/to cultivate/to study/to take (a class)

sentences.english: 17 press officials from 16 African countries attend the seminar.
sentences.chinese: 非洲16个国家17名新闻官员参加了研修班。

sentences.english: Do you wish to receive promotional information about future Institutes?
sentences.chinese: 你希望在日后收取有关研修班的资料吗？

sentences.english: In addition to Beijing, the members also visit Shenzhen and Guizhou.
sentences.chinese: 除北京外，研修班还访问了深圳和贵州。

sentences.english: Graduates who have completed certificate courses of MBA in training providers attached to Tsinghua University at home or abroad.
sentences.chinese: 或已在清华完成高级工商管理研修班课程的学员。

sentences.english: The picture shows the Vegetable Garden set up by returned Chinese trainee to Japan.
sentences.chinese: 图为赴日研修生回国创办的绿色农场。

sentences.english: Have you ever attended Hanban-sponsored teacher training before? If "YES", please explain.
sentences.chinese: 以前是否参加过来华研修？如果是，请说明。

sentences.english: This study was a sub-project of the Ministry of Education sending a group of backbone of student affairs conducing training & research to the United States.
sentences.chinese: 本研究为教育部学生工作骨干赴美研修项目的子课题。

sentences.english: 14 2007 from cafa reveal successful ten people.
sentences.chinese: 2007年中央美院十四届研修班十人展。

sentences.english: Monitoring and directing member units to manage persons studied abroad.
sentences.chinese: 监督指导会员单位对赴国外研修人员的管理工作。

definition: to undertake advanced studies/to take a refresher course
to study away from home or abroad (old)
to teach/teaching and learning/education/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4]
to major (in a field)/to study a specialty to obtain a higher degree
to seek knowledge/to study/to attend college
